    • Uses of ScopeMXBean in org.red5.server.jmx.mxbeans

      Subinterfaces of ScopeMXBean in org.red5.server.jmx.mxbeans 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  GlobalScopeMXBean
      An MBean interface for the scope object.
      interface  WebScopeMXBean
      An MBean interface for the web scope object.

    • Uses of ScopeMXBean in org.red5.server.scope

      Classes in org.red5.server.scope that implement ScopeMXBean 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GlobalScope
      Global scope is a top level scope.
      class  RoomScope
      Represents a subscope to other scopes.
      class  Scope
      The scope object.
      class  WebScope
      Web scope is special scope that is aware of servlet context and represents scope of a Red5 application within a servlet container (or application server) such as Tomcat, Jetty or JBoss.
